description:
Python is quickly becoming the go-to language for data analysis.
However, it can be difficult to figure out which tools are good to use.
In this workshop, we’ll work through in-depth examples of tools for data
wrangling, machine learning, and data visualization. I’ll show you how
to work through a data analysis workflow, and how to deal with different
kinds of data.
title: Hands-on Data Analysis with Python
